name: LUFTMEOWSERS Flight Demo v0.1
description:
A LUFTRAUSERS-LIKE 3D 'REMAKE'! JAM PROTOTYPE v0.1!
 Controls:
Mouse to steer
Left click to use afterburners

Tip: While using afterburners, you turn slower. Try releasing to make quick turns, then hold it down again. Turn 'n' Burn!

This is just a WIP! There's currently no goals, just as it says - a flight demo. Shooting and enemies coming Soon™. Made as part of firepit's game a week 2022 jams.
